wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Morris (28 April 1942 – 11 March 2015) was an English accountant who was liquidator of some of the most notable British business failures of the twentieth century, such as Bank of Credit & Commerce International, Laker Airways and Polly Peck.

response: * Christopher Morris (Master of the Ordnance) (born c. 1490), military administrator during the rule of Henry VIII
* Christopher Morris (news presenter) (born 1938), BBC and Sky News journalist
*Christopher Morris, 72, English accountant.Christopher Morris, liquidator - obituary
